column3:
近くに大きな危険はないはずだから
二手に分かれて捜索しよう
column4: Since there shouldn't be any major dangers nearby, let's split up and search in two groups.

column3:
俺はメガド内の<NPC 691>が
よく行く場所を当たってみる
お前は、街の周辺を探してみてくれ
column4:
I'll look for the places in Megado that <NPC 691> frequents.
You can check the area around the city.

column3: あ、あんたは――覚者さん！？
column4: Oh, you are... an Arisen!?

column3:
絶妙なタイミングで来てくれたな！
メガドの周りにオークの残党が潜んでたみたいで
散歩してたら、
うっかり鉢合わせちまったんだ！
column4:
Wow, you really came at the perfect time!
It seems that there were some leftover orcs lurking around the area of Megado.
While I was taking a stroll, I accidentally ran into them!

column3: で、今追いかけまわされてるってワケ――
column4: And now they're chasing after me...

column3:
って、ホラ！
噂をすればまた来たぞ！
column4:
Hey, listen!
They've come back because of the rumors!

column3:
いやー、助かった――
まさか覚者さん、あんたが来てくれるとはな
まさに、“ヒーロー！”って感じだったぜ
column4:
Oh, thank goodness -
I never expected you, Arisen, to come
It really felt like, 'A hero has arrived!'

column3: で、なんでここに？
column4: So, why are you here?

column3:
へ――メフィスが？
ひぇ！！
column4:
Huh? Mephis is here?
Whoa!!

column3:
お、俺はちゃんと資材集めてたって！
その――ちょっと足をくじいちまったんで
休んでたんだよ
な、メフィスにそう伝えてくれよ
column4:
Oh, I was actually gathering materials!
But, umm, I twisted my foot...
So I was resting.
C-Can you please tell that to Mephis?

column3: 頼むぜ！
column4: I'm counting on you!

column3:
メガドにはいないようだった――
そっちはどうだ？
column4:
It seems they weren't in Megado... 
How about over there?

column3:
なっ――
足をくじいただと？
あのバカ！
column4:
Oh...
Did you sprain your ankle?
You idiot!

column3:
全く、手のかかる奴だな――
だが無事なことは分かって良かったな
column4:
Oh, you are quite a handful...
But I'm glad you're safe.

column3:
手伝ってくれて、助かった
――これに懲りず、また訪ねてくれよ
column4:
Thanks for your help and for your assistance.
Please come again another time.

護りの力、いざ結束の時！

Fort Gritten has confirmed the approach of the Orc army.
All Arisen comrades, gather in front of the temple gate, preparing for the defense.
It's time to unite our protective strength!

column3:
北部のオークどもに動きがあったようだ――
お前も戦に備えて準備してくれ
column4:
It seems that there has been movement from the Orcs in the northern region――
Please prepare yourself for battle.

column3:
オークとの戦争がはじまったなら
再度、私の元に訪れてエントリー
しにきてくれ
column4:
If the war with the Orcs has begun, visit me once again and come to enlist.
I await your arrival.

column3:
グリッテン砦にて戦争が始まるみたいです
レスタニアニュースで確認くださいね
column4:
It looks like the war is starting at Fort Gritten.
Check it out on Lestania News!

column3:
詳しい情報は《中央広場》にいる白衛騎士団の
アランさんをお訪ねください
column4: For more information, please visit Alan of the White Guard Knights at the Central Square.

column3:
グリッテン砦で戦争が始まるらしいですわ
弟は大丈夫かしら、心配だわ
column4:
I've heard there's a war going on at Fort Gritten.
I hope my brother is ok, I'm worried about him.

column3:
まもなく砦で戦がはじまるって本当ですか！？
あー私も覚者さまのようになって
戦場を駆け抜けてみたいな
column4:
Is it true that the battle will start soon at the fort?!
Oh, how I wish I could be like you, Arisen, and run through the battlefield!

column3:
もうすぐグリッテンで戦がはじまるそうだ
戦場ではとにかく気を抜くなよ
column4:
The battle is about to begin in Fort Gritten.
Don't let your guard down on the battlefield.

column3:
オークの奴らめ
何度攻め入ろうとも無駄なこと
次も返り討ちにしてくれる
column4:
Those damned orcs!
No matter how many times they try to invade, I'll beat them back again.

column3:
ヒルデ姉さんには無理するなといわれているけれど
次の戦で戦果を上げて昇進したいと思っているんだ
column4: I know sister Hilde told me not to push myself too hard, but I still want to excel in the next battle and get promoted.

column3:
戦は稼ぎ時でもあるんだ――
思い切って投資すれば
それだけ得られるものも大きいぞ
column4:
War is a great time to make money...
If you take a risk and invest, you can get a lot in return.

column3:
グリッテン砦の防衛は
バートランド平原でも重要な任務だ
column4: The defense of Fort Gritten is also an important mission in the Betland Plains.

column3:
優秀な戦果を収めたものには
それに応じた報酬も与えられるので
ぜひ防衛隊に参加してくれ
column4: Excellent war results will be rewarded accordingly, so please join the defense team!

Arisen, join the defenders and protect the fort!

column3:
ついに開戦したみたいです
気を付けて立派に戦ってきてください
column4:
It looks like the war has finally started.
Take care and go fight honorably!

column3:
詳しい情報はレスタニアニュースを
確認の上、《中央広場》にいる覚者隊の
アランさんをお訪ねください
column4: For more information, please check the Lestania News and visit Mr. Alan of the Arisen Corps in the "Central Square"!

column3:
覚者さま、弟を戦場で見かけた時は
どうか、そのお力でお守りくださいませ
column4: Dear Arisen, if you see my brother on the battlefield, please protect him with your power!

column3:
覚者さま、ついに戦が始まったって聞きました
ご武運をお祈りしていますね！
column4:
Arisen, I heard that the battle has finally started.
I wish you good luck in your war!

column3:
グリッテンの戦況はよく確認して向かうのだ
そうすれば色々見えてくるものもあるだろう
活躍を期待しているぞ
column4:
Check the war situation in Gritten carefully and head there. 
By doing so, you might be able to glean various information. 
I am looking forward to hearing of your achievements.

column3:
オーク相手に情けは無用だ
魔物もろとも斬り捨ててくれる
column4:
Show no mercy to the orcs.
Cut them down along with the monsters.

column3:
君、強そうだね
僕の隊で一緒に戦ってくれよ
column4:
You seem strong.
Fight alongside me in my squad.

column3:
凶悪な魔物は討伐評価も高くなる
倒せる自信があるなら
強敵との遭遇は幸運と捉えるべきだな
column4:
Powerful demons have higher defeat ratings.
If you're confident you can defeat them, look at the encounter with those formidable foes as good luck.

column3:
この戦いで戦果をあげることによって
バートランド平原のエリアポイントも
得ることができる
column4: By achieving results in this battle, you can also gain Betland Plains area points.

column3: 頑張って奮戦してくれ
column4: Please fight bravely and do your best.

column4: Battle for Gritten Fort

column3:
防衛戦ごくろうだった！
諸君らの活躍により敵軍は退却、沈静化した
現在戦果報酬を確認中だ、しばし待つがいい
column4:
The defense battle was a tough one!
Thanks to everyone's efforts, the enemy forces have retreated and the situation has calmed down.
We are currently in the process of confirming the battle results and rewards. Please wait for a moment.

column3:
何とか砦を守り切れたな
今は各位の戦果を確認中だ
column4:
We were somehow able to defend the fort.
We are currently confirming each person's contribution.

column3:
報酬は後に与えられる
確認が終わるまで待っていてくれ
column4:
The rewards will be given later.
Please wait until the confirmation is complete.

column3: オーク軍を退けることができたみたいですね
column4: It seems that we were able to repel the Orc army.

column3:
グリッテンの戦も落ち着いたようですわね
弟も無事でなによりです
column4: It seems that the battle in Gritten has also settled down. It is a relief that my younger brother is safe.

column3:
お怪我はありませんか！？
覚者さまやみんなのおかげで敵を撃退できたこと
すごくうれしく思います――
column4:
Are you injured!?
Thanks to the Arisen and everyone, we were able to repel the enemy.
I am very grateful――

column3:
敵を撃退できて何よりだ
戦場を共にに切り抜けた仲間と
肩を並べて飲む一杯は格別だ！
column4:
I'm glad we were able to fight off the enemy!
It's a special thing to drink a cup of wine shoulder-to-shoulder with friends who have made it through a battlefield together!

column3:
よく頑張ってくれた
皆のおかげで撃退できたのだ
感謝する
column4:
You did well and worked hard.
We were able to repel the enemy thanks to everyone.
I am grateful.

column3:
はぁーなんとか無事だったけれど
活躍どころじゃなかったよ
column4: Ah, I managed to make it through safely, but I didn't really have a chance to shine.

column3:
俺がコツコツ稼いだところで
強い奴等は一度の戦いで
1年分は稼いでいっちまうんだ
column4: Even if I diligently earn little by little, the strong ones can earn a year's worth in just one battle.

column3:
どうだ、戦果は期待できそうか？
俺の活躍も副隊長の目にとまってくれていると
いいんだが――
column4:
What do you think?
I hope my successes have also caught the attention of the Vice Captain.

各位、保管ボックスより受け取ってくれ

報酬を受け取ってくれ
column4:

Please accept your rewards.

レスタニアニュースにて確認くださいね
column4:
It seems that rewards based on your achievements are being given. 
Please check it out on Lestania News!

column3:
先の戦いで功績のあった方には報酬が
出たそうですわ――
column4: I heard that there was a reward for those who made a difference in the last battle!

column3:
でも私にとっては弟の元気な姿が
何よりの報酬です
column4: But for me, the best reward is to see my brother in good health.

column3:
戦場で活躍したみんなに報酬が
出たみたいですね
column4: It seems that everyone who performed well on the battlefield received a reward!

column3:
私もいつか、みなさんの隣りで
活躍できたらなって思うんです
column4: One day I hope to work alongside all of you and I'll do my best to contribute to your success.

column3:
先の戦いで手柄に応じた報酬が出た
という話だ
column4: I heard that rewards were given for your achievements in the previous battle.

column3:
教官である今の俺にとっては、お前の活躍と
全身に刻み込まれた古傷が一番の誇りよ
column4: For me, as your current instructor, your achievements and the old scars engraved on your body are my greatest pride.

column3:
こたびの戦いの戦果に応じた報酬を配布中だ
防衛に参加してくれた全ての者は受け取ってくれ
column4:
We are currently distributing rewards based on the results of the battle. 
Please make sure to claim your rewards if you participated in the defense.

column3:
報酬は出たけれど、これじゃぁまだ姉さんに
報告するわけにはいかないなぁ
column4: I received the rewards, but I can't report to my sister like this.

column3:
いくら稼いだんだ？
俺にも少しくらい分けてくれよ
column4:
How much did you earn? 
Could you at least give me a little bit too?

column3:
報酬はもう受け取ったのか？
お前の活躍、嬉しいんだけど副隊長の注目が
集まると思うと複雑なんだよなぁ――
column4:
Have you already received your rewards? 
I'm happy about your achievements, but I can't help feeling conflicted when the vice captain's attention is drawn to you.

column4: Not bad. Keep it up.

column4: Let's cut them down!

column4: That's good. Let's move on to the next one.

column4: A new type of enemy, be careful!

column3: 今こそ名をあげる時だ――
column4: Now is the time to make a name for yourself.

column3: 相変わらずの臭いだな
column4: The smell is still the same as always.

column3: 今日こそ決着を付けてくれる！
column4: Today is the day we settle this!

column3: 逃がしたか――
column4: Did they escape?

column3: 覚者の命、全て狩り取ってくれるわ
column4: I will take the lives of all Arisen.

column3: 覚者の命は値千金！　奪え！
column4: The life of an Arisen is invaluable! Seize it!

column3: 今日はここまでだ
column4: Today is the end.

column3: まさか――この――俺が――
column4: I can't believe... that I...

column4: Alright, it's time to start mopping up!

column4: Wait, wait a moment... please!

Suppress the evil Dragon Army's counterattack and weaken their forces, then defeat the Beast Master lurking in the depths of the fortress to reclaim it.
